data.name: ConnectionDetail_CloudUnavailable
data.value: The website is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.

data.name: ConnectionDetail_CommunicationFailure
data.value: Unable to connect to the website.

data.name: ConnectionDetail_GatewayServiceUnavailable
data.value: The gateway service is unavailable. Verify that port 8443 is open in your firewall. If the port is open, the gateway service may be down temporarily. Please try again later.

data.name: ConnectionDetail_IncompatibleClient
data.value: The Sage Connector software is not compatible with the website. Please install a compatible version.

data.name: ConnectionDetail_InternetConnectionUnavailable
data.value: There is no internet connection. Please check with your system administrator.

data.name: ConnectionDetail_InvalidConnectionInformation
data.value: The connection information is not valid. Verify that the connection key on the site matches the connection key in the Sage Connector software.

data.name: ConnectionDetail_LocalNetworkUnavailable
data.value: There is no local network available on this computer. Please check with your system administrator.

data.name: ConnectionDetail_None
data.value: Unable to determine website connectivity. The site URL used by the Sage Connector may not match the actual website URL.

data.name: ConnectionDetail_Normal
data.value: The Sage Connector is communicating successfully with the website.

data.name: ConnectionDetail_Reconfigure
data.value: New connection information is needed. This will be retrieved automatically.

data.name: ConnectionDetail_TenantDisabled
data.value: This site has been suspended by Sage.
